title: Novel wind, photo-thermal and energy storage integrated intelligent power generation system and control method thereof
assignees: Inner Mongolia Electric Power Survey and Design Institute Co Ltd

events.title: Application filed by Inner Mongolia Electric Power Survey and Design Institute Co Ltd
events.assignee_search: Inner Mongolia Electric Power Survey and Design Institute Co Ltd

classifications.description: Planning or developing urban green infrastructure
Systems combining energy storage with energy generation of non-fossil origin

abstract: The invention provides a novel wind, photo-thermal, energy storage integrated power generation system and a control method thereof and belongs to the field of power generation technologies of wind, photo-thermal and energy storage. The novel wind, photo-thermal, energy storage integrated power generation system comprises a wind power generation system, a disk type photo-thermal solar power generation system, an energy storage system and an intelligent dispatching control system; the wind power generation system and the disk type photo-thermal solar power generation system are connected with an output bus through a boosting transformer; the energy storage system which is connected with an energy storage inverter is connected with the output bus through the boosting transformer; the intelligent dispatching control system is connected with the wind power generation system, the disk type photo-thermal solar power generation system and the energy storage system in a communication affordable mode to control the wind power generation system, the disk type photo-thermal solar power generation system and the energy storage system. According to the novel wind, PV, energy storage integrated power generation system comprises a wind power generation system and the control method thereof, problems that the existing disk type photo-thermal solar system is poor in stability and reliability, the existing wind, photo-thermal and energy storage system is complex in structure and low in photoelectric conversion efficiency are solved.
claims:
1. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system is characterized in that:
      Described system comprises: wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system, energy-storage system and intelligent scheduling control system; Wherein:
      Described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system are connected to the output bus by step-up transformer, and described energy-storage system is connected to the energy storage inverter, then by step-up transformer, is connected to the output bus;
      Intelligent scheduling control system and wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system and energy-storage system can communicate to connect, and are used for controlling wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system and energy-storage system.

2. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 1 is characterized in that:
      Described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system are connected to the output bus by step-up transformer and are specially: described wind power generation system is connected to the output bus by the first step-up transformer, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system by the second step-up transformer;
      Described energy-storage system is connected to the energy storage inverter, then by step-up transformer, is connected to the output bus and is specially:
      Described energy-storage system is connected to the energy storage inverter, then by the 3rd step-up transformer, is connected to the output bus.

3. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 1 is characterized in that:
      Described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system are connected to the output bus by step-up transformer, and described energy-storage system is connected to the energy storage inverter, then by step-up transformer, are connected to the output bus and are specially:
      Described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system are connected to low-voltage bus bar, described energy-storage system is connected to the energy storage inverter, described energy storage inverter is connected to described low-voltage bus bar, and described low-voltage bus bar is connected to the output bus by a merging step-up transformer.

5. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 4 is characterized in that:
      The heat engine of described dish formula photo-thermal solar power system is Stirling-electric hybrid and/or thermoacoustic engine.

6. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 4 is characterized in that:
      The storage battery of described energy-storage system of accumulator is sodium-sulphur battery, flow battery and/or ferric phosphate lithium cell.

7. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 1 is characterized in that:
      The intelligent scheduling control system is used for, according to the power output aim curve, wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system and energy-storage system are provided control command.

8. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 7 is characterized in that:
      Described aim curve, for wind-powered electricity generation unit and solar energy output power curve being carried out the output power curve of peak load shifting after level and smooth, is perhaps the trace scheduling curve.

9. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 1 is characterized in that:
      When described intelligent scheduling control system was used for power that the AC power of sending when wind power generation system and dish formula photo-thermal solar power system requires higher than described intelligent scheduling control system, control energy storage inverter was converted into direct current to be stored in energy-storage system; While also being used for the power that requires lower than the intelligent scheduling control system when AC power, the control energy-storage system is converted into alternating current through the energy storage inverter with direct current, then through step-up transformer, delivers to the output bus.

10. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 1 is characterized in that:
      Described intelligent scheduling control system also is used for obtaining the history data of wind power generation system and dish formula photo-thermal solar power system, and obtain local meteorological data, according to the power output evaluation model, wind power generation system and dish formula photo-thermal solar power system are carried out power prediction to obtain the power curve of next day.

11. novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system according to claim 10 is characterized in that:
      Described intelligent scheduling control system also is used for the power curve that obtains according to described power prediction, and the plan that discharges and recharges of prearranged energy-storage system, obtains the inferior daily planning generating output power curve of novel wind-light storage intelligence combined generating system.

13. control method according to claim 12 is characterized in that:
      Described comparative result according to described the first comparison step, control described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system and energy-storage system and specifically comprise:
      When the comparative result of the first comparison step is present output power during less than the power output aim curve, to the energy-storage system control energy storage system discharges that transmits control signal;
      Current power output and power output aim curve are made comparisons, when equal, return and continue described the first comparison step, when the unequal target deviation of carrying out is proofreaied and correct, when being positioned at deviation range, returning and continue described the first comparison step, when having exceeded deviation range, aim curve is optimized adjustment, returns and continue described the first comparison step.

14. method according to claim 13 is characterized in that:
      Described comparative result according to described the first comparison step, control described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system and energy-storage system and also comprise:
      , when the comparative result of the first comparison step is present output power during greater than the power output aim curve, to energy-storage system, transmit control signal and control energy-storage system and carry out energy storage;
      current power output and power output aim curve are made comparisons, when equal, return and continue described the first comparison step, when greater than the power output aim curve, transmit control signal and carry out power stage and control to reduce power stage to wind power generation system and dish formula photo-thermal solar power system, current power output and power output aim curve are made comparisons, return when equal and continue described the first comparison step, carrying out target deviation when greater than the power output aim curve proofreaies and correct, when being positioned at deviation range, return and continue described the first comparison step, when having exceeded deviation range, the power output aim curve is optimized adjustment, return and continue described the first comparison step.

15. control method according to claim 14 is characterized in that:
      Described comparative result according to described the first comparison step, control described wind power generation system, dish formula photo-thermal solar power system and energy-storage system and also comprise:
      , when the comparative result of the first comparison step is present output power while meeting the power output aim curve, return and continue described the first comparison step.
